list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is learning how to make pottery.

list_definition.definition: (plural potteries) a place where articles of fired clay are made

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is working in the pottery.

list_definition.definition: the art of making such articles
